[[inst_hl_swip_u]]
==== HL.SWIP.U

*Syntax:* hl.swip.u SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swip_u.svg[HL.SWIP.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
